members.name: Desert Oasis Tours
members.description: Guided tours of the Culiacan Desert and historical sites around Culiacan.

members.name: Sahara Textiles
members.description: Traditional Malian textiles and fabrics, specializing in indigo-dyed cloth.

members.description: Non-profit organization dedicated to preserving Culiacan's historical manuscripts and cultural heritage.

members.description: Renewable energy provider specializing in solar installations for homes and businesses.

members.description: Co-working space and technology incubator supporting local entrepreneurs and startups.

members.description: Cooperative of local artisans producing traditional Malian crafts and souvenirs.

members.description: Sustainable fishing company providing fresh fish from the Niger River to local markets and restaurants.

members.description: Modern medical facility providing healthcare services to the Culiacan region.
